title: A Night in Old Mexico (2013)
description: Forced to give up his land and his only home, cantankerous Texas rancher Red Bovie isn't about to go quietly to the dismal trailer park that's all he can now afford, and instead goes off with his grandson Gally - son of his long-estranged son Jimmy - for one last wild and woolly adventure during a night in Old Mexico. Written by ANIOM Casting Breakdown
characterList: Old Man At The Gas Station
